SEARCH
Package com.example.atlasevents.utils

Class NotificationHistoryHelper

java.lang.Object
com.example.atlasevents.utils.NotificationHistoryHelper
public class NotificationHistoryHelper extends Object
Helper class for loading and displaying notification history. This class handles the logic for: - Loading notifications from Firestore for both entrants and organizers - Creating notification cards for display - Formatting timestamps and data - sending out lottery selection invites and handling responses/
See Also:
  • NotificationHistoryActivity
  • NotificationRepository
  • LotteryService

    • NotificationHistoryHelper

      public NotificationHistoryHelper(android.content.Context context, com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, android.widget.LinearLayout container)
      Creates a new helper instance.
      Parameters:
      context - Android context for inflating layouts
      db - Firestore instance
      container - The LinearLayout where notification cards will be added

  • Method Details

    • loadEntrantReceivedNotifications

      public void loadEntrantReceivedNotifications(String userEmail, NotificationHistoryHelper.NotificationLoadCallback callback, NotificationHistoryHelper.MarkAsReadCallback markAsReadCallback)
      Loads received notifications for an entrant user. Queries: users/{userEmail}/notifications/ Sorted by: createdAt descending (newest first)
      Parameters:
      userEmail - The email of the entrant user
      callback - Callback for success/failure handling
      markAsReadCallback - Callback for mark-as-read actions

    • loadOrganizerSentNotifications

      public void loadOrganizerSentNotifications(String userEmail, NotificationHistoryHelper.NotificationLoadCallback callback)
      Loads sent notifications for an organizer user from notification_logs. Queries: notification_logs collection Filtered by: fromOrganizer field matching userEmail Sorted by: createdAt descending (newest first)
      Parameters:
      userEmail - The email of the organizer user
      callback - Callback for success/failure handling

    • loadAdminAllNotificationLogs

      public void loadAdminAllNotificationLogs(NotificationHistoryHelper.NotificationLoadCallback callback)
      Loads ALL notification logs for admin review from notification_logs collection. Uses NotificationRepository's existing getNotificationLogs method.
      Parameters:
      callback - Callback for success/failure handling

    • setCurrentUserEmail

      public void setCurrentUserEmail(String email)
      Sets the current user email from the activity
